home.description: I'm Felipe, and since 2021, I have remained committed to continuous learning and improvement. My focus is on delivering high-quality work while constantly evolving in the world of programming.

careers.title: üíº Career
careers.description: Below we have the places I've been, where I've worked, technologies I've used and a description of the work I've done.

questions.title: üí≠Frequently asked questions
questions.description: Questions that I get often, answered for you.

questions.name: What services do you provide?
questions.response: Primarily, I offer Back-end Development, API design, database management, cloud infrastructure setup, DevOps automation, and system optimization.

questions.name: How many years of experience do you have?
questions.response: I started in 2021 with programming, in 2022 I entered college and in 2023 I got my first experience as a developer.

questions.name: Is on-location work possible?
questions.response: I mainly work from Brazil. However I can't commit to working at one specific location regularly. I work remotely because it saves time on commuting and allows me to focus more on projects.

questions.name: What are your rates?
questions.response: The price varies depending on the project. I offer fixed prices and hourly rates, always discussing the details with you in advance. As an approximate figure, our hourly rate is typically around $5 per hour, excluding VAT.

cta.description: Why not email me or send me a message.
